articles.title: Paris Holden's CV
articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!
articles.contents:
Paris Holden’s CV
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Summary
            As a postgraduate university student I am highly organised with the ability to work extremely hard, under pressure and consistently meet deadlines. I am a dedicated team player who can be relied upon to help your business thrive and achieve set goals. I have interests in crime and criminal offending as well as mental health and wellbeing, particulary in adolescence.
            
            
            Skills
            Fast learner
            Interpersonal skills
            Excellent work ethic
            Committed
            Enthusiastic
            Hardworking
            Experience working in R
            
            
            Education
            NCEA level 3 and university entranceSt Peter’s College (2011 - 2017)
            Bachelor of Science majoring in Criminology and PsychologyTe Herenga Waka - Victoria University of Wellington (2018 - 2021)
            Bachelor of Science with Honours in PsychologyTe Herenga Waka - Victoria University of Wellington (2021 - present)
            
            
            Job Experience
            Hotel Coachman/La Patio Café & BarMarch 2018 - February 2019/August 2019 - December 2019
            Front of house waitress in Hotel Coachman’s restaurant ‘La Patio Café & Bar’, at times acting as either restaurant or function supervisor.
            The Thistle InnJanurary 2020 - Present
            Front of house waitress and bartender at one of New Zealand’s oldest pubs.
            Working in hospitality for the past three years has allowed me to gain experience in money handling, multi-tasking and customer service. These years in hospitality has also increased my high attention to detail and professionalism. All skills that I hope to use that will contribute to the successful career I am aiming to achieve.
            If you would like to get in contact, please do not hesitate to send me an email or message through LinkedIn.
